description: Detects the execution of "gpg.exe" from uncommon location. Often used by ransomware and loaders to decrypt/encrypt data.
name: Portable Gpg.EXE Execution
query: ((process.executable:(*\\gpg.exe OR *\\gpg2.exe)) OR process.pe.original_file_name:gpg.exe OR process.pe.description:GnuPGâ€™s\ OpenPGP\ tool) AND (NOT (process.executable:(*\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\GNU\\GnuPG\\bin\\* OR *\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\GnuPG\ VS\-Desktop\\* OR *\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\GnuPG\\bin\\* OR *\:\\Program\ Files\ \(x86\)\\Gpg4win\\bin\\*)))
author: frack113, Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
